content.text: How TO - List Group with Badges
Learn how to create a List Group with Badges, using CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a List Group with Badges, using CSS.

content.text: How To Create a List Group

content.code_html:
<ul>
  <li>Inbox <span class="badge">2</span></li>
  <li>Other <span class="badge">5</span></li>
  <li>Saved</li>
  <li>Stuff</li>
  <li>Old</li>
</ul>

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Transform a basic list into a customized list group */
/* Style badges inside the list group */

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Transform a basic list into a customized list group */
/* Style badges inside the list group */

content.code_html:
/* Transform a basic list into a customized list group */
ul.list-group {
  list-style-type: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

ul.list-group li {
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent double borders */
  background-color: #f6f6f6;
  padding: 12px;
}

/* Style badges inside the list group */
ul.list-group .badge {
  background-color: red;
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: bold;
  border-radius: 50%;
  padding: 5px 10px;
  text-align: center;
  margin-left: 5px;
}
